title: stuck on black champ select screen for 5 minutes happend to guys i was in duo que with  but
body: like i said i have been stuck in the champ select screen unable to do anything coz it black screens to me n my mates but i can't dodge with out get lever busted i don't think http://puu.sh/eWXDT/80745868fa.png i don't know what to do

replies.body:
No one uses the built in image attachment feature. Maybe because it's buggy? Maybe because people just don't like it? Maybe because they're already used to using other services on forums that don't support image attachments? I don't know.

But anyway, what OS are you on?
